Storage Solutions

Storage Devices

Professional storage solutions for surveillance systems including hard drives and storage arrays

DE1848-V2

High-performance 4U storage enclosure supporting up to 48 drives with 12Gbps SAS-3 technology, redundant power supplies, and intelligent cooling system

High-Quality Hardware Design with superior build quality
12Gbps SAS-3 technology for exceptional performance
Space-saving 4U design with 48-disk capacity

SSD-256G-P3-M2

256GB PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSD designed for high-performance storage applications with fast read/write speeds and reliable TLC storage technology

High-speed PCIe 3.0 x4 interface
Fast 3100MB/s sequential read speeds
1300MB/s sequential write performance

VX3048-V2

48 HDD Network Storage Host with high availability, failover support, and intelligent RAID engine

High Available Failover
Intelligent RAID Engine (ISET)
Super Error Correction (SEC)
